login.signInAgreement: By signing in you accept GBIFs [terms](/terms) and [privacy policy](/terms/privacy-policy).
login.invalidUsername: A valid username is 3-64 characters and only contains letters a-z (lowercase) and ._-
login.passwordLength: Password must be 6 characters or more
login.passwordMaxLength: You password may not be above 256 characters
login.selectAllImages: Select all images below like this one
login.tryAgainLater: We couldn't reset you password right now - please try again later. Sorry for the inconvenience
login.criticalFailure: Hmm - this isn't good. Please try to refresh. If the problem persists, then please let us know.
login.verficationLinkSent: You have been sent an email with a verification link to ensure it is your mail. Welcome to GBIF
login.resetPasswordMessage: We have sent you a mail with a link to reset your password.
